description: User interface widgets for business reporting including report cards, detail views, and analytics visualization

components.ReportCard: Performance-optimized report preview card displaying summary metrics with RepaintBoundary isolation and UI Bible compliance.

rules: UI Bible compliance with RepaintBoundary optimization isolating report cards from unnecessary rebuilds during list scrolling.
Comprehensive report type support: revenue, service performance, technician performance, customer analytics, appointment analytics, payment analytics.
ReportData union type integration using 'when' pattern for type-safe report data handling across different report types.
Color-coded report categories with distinct AppColors theming: green (revenue), blue (services), purple (staff), orange (customers), teal (appointments), warning (payments).
Professional card design with elevation, shadows, rounded corners, and proper Material Design touch feedback.
Loading state management with centered progress indicators and proper visual feedback.
Error state handling with user-friendly error messages and warning iconography.
Empty state management with appropriate messaging for reports with no data.
Business metrics display with formatted currency, percentages, and statistical trend indicators.
Trend visualization with positive/negative indicators using green/red color coding and trending icons.
Professional report categorization with descriptive titles and subtitles for each report type.
Summary content display showing key metrics: totals, averages, percentages, and comparative data.
Interactive tap handling with onTap callbacks for navigation to detailed report views.
Metric row builder with consistent label/value formatting and proper text styling.
Performance optimization with const constructors and RepaintBoundary widgets minimizing rebuild impact.
Icon integration with report type-specific iconography providing visual identification.
Professional business styling with consistent spacing, typography, and color schemes.
Revenue metrics display: total revenue, daily/weekly breakdowns, and period comparisons.
Service performance metrics: completion counts, average values, and trend analysis.
Staff performance tracking: appointment counts, ratings, and productivity indicators.

components.ReportDetailView: Comprehensive detailed report view with full data visualization, metrics grids, and chart placeholders.
components._MetricCard: Performance-optimized metric card component for displaying key business indicators with color-coded theming.

rules: Full-screen detailed report interface with header navigation, refresh functionality, and comprehensive content display.
ReportData union type integration using 'when' pattern for type-safe detailed report rendering across all report types.
Responsive metrics grid with LayoutBuilder calculating optimal column count based on available width (1-4 columns).
Professional scaffold layout with proper header styling, navigation, and content area organization.
Loading state management with descriptive text and proper visual feedback during data fetching.
Comprehensive error handling with retry functionality and user-friendly error messages.
Empty state management with appropriate iconography and messaging for reports with no data.
Chart placeholder system providing foundation for future data visualization integration.
Performance optimization with RepaintBoundary widgets isolating static content from dynamic updates.
Revenue report detailed metrics: total, daily, weekly, monthly revenue with trend analysis placeholders.
Service performance analytics: completion counts, average values, growth rates, and performance metrics.
Staff performance tracking: appointment metrics, ratings, productivity indicators, and individual analysis.
Customer analytics display: customer counts, acquisition metrics, retention data, and visit value analysis.
Appointment analytics overview: booking metrics, completion rates, cancellation tracking, and show-up rates.
Payment analytics breakdown: transaction totals, payment method distribution, tips tracking, and processing metrics.
Color-coded metric cards with distinct theming for each report type maintaining visual consistency.
Professional chart section design with titles, descriptions, and placeholder content for future visualization.
Back navigation integration with tooltip support and proper Material Design interaction patterns.
Refresh functionality with loading state management and disabled state during data operations.
Scrollable content layout supporting large amounts of report data with proper padding and spacing.
